reviews.review: Hilarious and great classic puzzle game

The attempt of the steam service to spoil the mood of users from Russia and Belarus is pathetic and inadequate, the Western world does not have the resources to influence what is going on in the direction of its benefit in what is happening in the post-Soviet space, so there are small dirty tricks against ordinary people who hide from the vile reality in games, a new era of piracy awaits us all...

I know it says I only have like .6 hours on my steam account at the time im reviewing this but is one of the best games ive played period. I probably sinked almost 250 hours into this game just messing around in the community test chambers because this game is fun as hell and has so much replay ability. The story is also very entertaining with characters like wheatly but then mysterious and creepy when you get to the underground and old aperture science area. this is one of those games all steam users should have on their library. thanks valve now wheres the 3rd one.

This is a very good game if you like puzzles and science. The campaign has a good story, the co-op mode is fun, and the Community test chambers are great. I really love the never ending puzzles created by the community. I give this game a 10/10, highly recommend.
这次是来补票的，22年玩16年的游戏，依旧被震撼，多的不用说

Portal 2 is one of the few follow up games that is equal to the original. On the off chance that you have not played either and are looking to make a first time purchase of this game, let me break it down for you.

The game is all about using your problem solving abilities in a fun and creative way to complete puzzle levels. You have a gun the makes two portals that you can enter into and pass through from one to another in order over come obstacles. 

It was a ground breaking, new type of game at it's time of release and is still a rare game concept to this day although its becoming more common with slight alterations. That being said no one does it or has done it quiet like this team did.

The game is story driven and riddled with sarcasm and moderate dark humor that is bound to make you chuckle each time. I personally find the puzzles to be very challenging at times although far from impossible. 

The graphics are solid even for it's age and the game offers a fair amount of replay value. This is my second time purchasing it if that tells you anything. (Console to PC)

The games story plots do tie in together but playing the 1st is not a requirement to enjoy the second, I played them in reverse order and was still pulled in enough to go an by the 1st later on.

My biggest complaint is that the games are short and the replay value is limited, more so with the 1st game than this one but even with Co-op installation in this game, once you get the hang of the puzzles/mechanics, you will start completing the levels faster and faster.


Overall, I think it's a great game to keep in the library and I always go back to it from time to time because it's just so satisfying,relaxing and easy to lose yourself in (Eminem?).

Same great puzzle solving gameplay, but bigger. 
The only problem is that there are more sequences where gameplay is taken away from you, compared to the first game where it's non stop in engine gameplay.

Игра очень олдовая и классная! К моему удивлению, она не требует мощного пк (правда когда я добавил оперативки, лагов стало намного меньше). В игра не заставляет решать сложные задания, к тому же они залепательные! Вы можете ощутить себя гением, когда пройдёте камеру с головоломкой. ИГРА ВОСХИТИТЕЛЬНАЯ, СТАВЛЮ 22 ИЗ 10 ЗВЁЗД!

Как и многие легендарные игры от Valve, эта не стала исключением. Перед вами GOTY 2011 и одна из лучших в мире головоломок. Определённо Portal 2 , в отличии от 1-й части обрела самостоятельность и уже не является простым модом на Half life, а стала чем-то больше. Сказать нечего... Многие люди и так знают какой это шедевр даже в наше время. Игра почти не устарела. Отличная оптимизация, графика для 22-года, сюжет и чёрный юмор также приятен) А по количеству её отзывов и наград можно лишь сказать что игра 10/10.

This is just a MASTERPIECE!
Enjoyed every bit of the game!
10/10

Хорошая игра, всем советую. Что касается цены: продаётся она за дешевую цену, учитывая сколько, по-настоящему, разработчики вкладывали в эту игру душу и своё искреннее трудолюбие. Хорошие шутки, сюжет, каждая текстурка, головоломка сделана как-то живо. В общем никогда финал, да и игра в целом не приносили мне столько положительных и эмоций. Portal 2 - игра на столетия, я уверен что даже через полсотни, сотню, если такое будет возможно, игра будет ценится и проходится. Спасибо Valve за хорошую игру!
